For Info :

Search for Masala in atozmp3.in

Why ~ in 1024 Kbps?
Each song is around 1000 Kbps more or less,Constant BitRate not exact

Webseed included
WTF is that?
It will allow you to download even there are no seeders

Get it before it is taken down
coz companies are greedy and they want your money

I m nt saying this movie'music is awesome,but the quality is
Its just a sample to know the quality
This is more like creating awareness

FLAC didnt catch up among Telugu
but its slowly growing

HD Music is the present and the future

Dont be cheap and sell it; Show it to your friends and let 'em know
This is created with a good intention to create awareness that "You are listening wrong..Switch to Lossless "

For comparison of FLAC with MP3, download 128/320 VBR of a same song and listen
If you can't differentiate,then this is not for you;Either your ears adapted to choppy mp3 or you have a very bad audio system

Best when listened in

Lossless formats like FLAC/WAV being high quality gives clear audio experience without choppy,blurry noisy that MP3 have


Disclaimer: I am in no way affiliated to AtoZ
My only intention is mp3 is crappy
with high speed internet & cheap storage space, you can listen to better quality

Why I want you to listen ?
It all started when I saw a documentary by Music artists Snoop Dogg,AR Rehman etc.. about how hard they try to make studio quality music for perfect listening and this compression, listening quality is ruined MP3 90%

This FLAC is no exception ,it is compressed to ~60% but retains quality hence LOSSLESS

Typical File size is 6 times MP3(~5MB), ie .. usually around ~30MB

If you want the best sound 100% quality , buy the original CD or from officlal source

Mp3 has been around for 10 years

[color=orange]"The best music needs to be preserved in the best quality ."

CDs last for 10 years max...Even Hard disk wont last long
If you think the music is awesome and want to preserve music for let's just say 100 years,the only way is create millions of copies
thanks to Internet & Torrents



Companies only want money,they don't give shit to preserve music (exception very few)

I'm sure FLAC will be replaced by something better in the future ..Until then stick to FLAC/DTS ,Switch to it if you are still stuck with MP3 128/320

How nice if you could listen to each instrument being played and individual beat mesmerizing ears
Yes,I'm an audiophile

Use this for knowledge purposes ,not to sell and such bullshit
Buy the CDs and support the creators


Why did I upload?
just b'coz I know how to create a torrent

All Hail Lossless...Obsessed with perfection

If you have anything to say,post it on my wall/message me.
